attributes.action: Enact a law that forces spam emails to have an 'opt out' function to prevent future mailings
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I get the same spam emails time and again from supposedly 'reputable' British companies, (Coral, Asda and Alton Towers to name a few), and yet there is no option for me to request they stop sending this unwanted rubbish. It should be law that all commercial marketing emails should have a 'click here if you no longer wish to receive these emails' function to allow recipients to opt out of future mailings. Failing that, there should be something for email along the lines of the telephone preference / mailing preference service that stops you receiving cold calls or junk mail.
